mapper.insert: insert into trip (id, num, title, s_title, start_place, position, type, traffic, hotel, time, good_rate, place_score, hotel_score, service_score, traffic_score, is_ok) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startPlace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{traffic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{placeScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{hotelScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{serviceScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{trafficScore,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isOk,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update trip set num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_title = #{sTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_place = #{startPlace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, traffic = #{traffic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hotel = #{hotel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, good_rate = #{goodRate,jdbcType=REAL}, place_score = #{placeScore,jdbcType=REAL}, hotel_score = #{hotelScore,jdbcType=REAL}, service_score = #{serviceScore,jdbcType=REAL}, traffic_score = #{trafficScore,jdbcType=REAL}, is_ok = #{isOk,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, num, title, s_title, start_place, position, type, traffic, hotel, time, good_rate, place_score, hotel_score, service_score, traffic_score, is_ok from trip where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, num, title, s_title, start_place, position, type, traffic, hotel, time, good_rate, place_score, hotel_score, service_score, traffic_score, is_ok from trip

SELECT trip.id, trip.title, city.name city, price.price,trippicture.name picture FROM sequence, trip, city, price, trippicture WHERE sequence.value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sequence.id = trip.type AND trip.id = price.trip AND trip.id = trippicture.trip AND trip.start_place = city.id group by trip.id;

SELECT trip.id, trip.title, trip.s_title stitle, city.name city, price.price, trippicture.name picture FROM trip, city, price, trippicture WHERE trip.id = price.trip And trip.title like "%"#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" AND trip.start_place = city.id and trippicture.trip = trip.id GROUP BY trip.id;
